remarks: A principal ideal (an ideal generated by one element) in a commutative ring.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
statement:
prnc.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
prnc.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
prnc.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
prnc $p |- ( ( R e. CRingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( R IdlGen { A } ) = { x e. X | E. y e. X x = ( y H A ) } ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d X x y $.
